citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The facility has not been inspected by the IACUC during the past year and no evaluation report was available for
inspection.
One of the functions of the IACUC is to inspect at least once every 6 month all of its animal facilities and prepare
reports of its evaluaton.
To be corrected by May 31, 2019.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.

narrative:
